name: food-delivery-microservices-typescript
description: Food Delivery Microservices Platform built with TypeScript, Express, and PostgreSQL

scripts.install:all: npm run install:shared && npm run install:services
scripts.install:services: for service in api-gateway order-service restaurant-service kitchen-service delivery-service accounting-service notification-service; do cd $service && npm install && cd ..; done
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:services
scripts.build:services: for service in api-gateway order-service restaurant-service kitchen-service delivery-service accounting-service notification-service; do cd $service && npm run build && cd ..; done
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "cd api-gateway && npm run dev" "cd order-service && npm run dev" "cd restaurant-service && npm run dev" "cd kitchen-service && npm run dev" "cd delivery-service && npm run dev" "cd accounting-service && npm run dev" "cd notification-service && npm run dev"
scripts.test:all: for service in api-gateway order-service restaurant-service kitchen-service delivery-service accounting-service notification-service; do cd $service && npm test && cd ..; done
scripts.lint:all: for service in api-gateway order-service restaurant-service kitchen-service delivery-service accounting-service notification-service; do cd $service && npm run lint && cd ..; done
scripts.lint:fix:all: for service in api-gateway order-service restaurant-service kitchen-service delivery-service accounting-service notification-service; do cd $service && npm run lint:fix && cd ..; done
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run start
